Page.slogan: IGP Anti Wrinkle Set Usage Instructions

text-block.content: To get the most out of your purchase you need to follow these simple steps in using your product.

1) Soap: Wash your face and pat it dry with a clean soft towel or soft cloth. This soap will both cleanse your skin and reduce wrinkles. 2) Toner: With a cotton ball gently apply the toner to your face in a thin layer without rubbing. 3) SunBlock: This is a very important part that you should NOT skip. Apply the sunblock amply to your face and neck at least 30 minutes before you get exposure to the sun. This will help you preserve the effects of the other products that you have just used

1) Soap: As in the morning, wash your face and pat it dry with a clean soft towel or soft cloth. 2) Evening Toner: The same procedure as in the morning, moisten a cotton ball gently apply the toner to your face in a thin layer without rubbing. 3) Cream: Apply a thin layer on your face and let it work for you overnight. It will prevent and reduce wrinkles in your face.
